title: build-env fails with message about openmpi for dbcsr

labels.name: triage
labels.description: The issue needs to be prioritized

body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```
$ spack build-env dbcsr %gcc@9.3.0 ~mpi
```
Somehow openmpi ends up in the spec when using build-env. It shouldn't. And oddly enough it assumes I have openmpi installed with gcc@10, even though I'm trying to concretize with gcc@9.

```
/home/harmen/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-zen2/gcc-10.2.0/openmpi-4.0.5-ep7fnjuuwsm6uqldcmfb4nzj7otztqjg
```
